alert.note: Alert for East Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 8:20PM CDT until July 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Southern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 820 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fitler, or 15 miles southeast of Lake Providence, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eagle Bend and Valley Park around 835 PM CDT. Redwood around 855 PM CDT. Oak Ridge around 900 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
